title: Amazon Expert Designer (Full-Time) (For German Amazon Agency)
job_overview:
We are seeking a highly skilled Amazon Expert Designer to join our growing team at a leading Amazon Agency. This is a full-time position with an excellent salary package for the right candidate.
As an Amazon Designer, your primary role will be to craft visually stunning images and graphics for Amazon listings, including product images, infographics, and A+ content. You will work closely with our Philippine design teams to ensure all designs reflect our brand’s identity and resonate with our target audience.

Key Responsibilities:
Create high-quality, engaging images for Amazon product listings.
Collaborate with the design and marketing teams to understand product and brand requirements.
Develop A+ content, infographics, and banners to enhance the product’s appeal.
Ensure all designs are optimized for Amazon’s platform and adhere to best practices.
Maintain brand consistency across all visual assets.
Qualifications:
• Proven experience with Amazon content creation and general design for e-commerce.
• Expertise in Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, and other relevant design tools.
• Strong attention to detail and creative mindset.
• Ability to meet deadlines and work independently in a fast-paced environment.
• Experience in the e-commerce industry (preferably Amazon) is a must.
Requirements:
• Must be based in the Philippines.
• Must have expert-level experience with Amazon content creation and general design.
This is a unique opportunity to grow your career within a fast-paced and exciting industry, working with a talented and collaborative team.
